ru_RU.title: EAT AT SIVANA
ru_RU.short_description_translated: Discover Eat At Sivana, located soi 126 in the heart of Sivana gardens and we can say, it's worth a visit. The restaurant offers a modern and cosy poolside seating. Enjoy Indian and Thai specialties to your taste. Excellent value for money.
ru_RU.description_translated:
- Discount before tax and service charge if applicable

- Available for 1 to 6 people

- Offer available for a la carte only

- 1 paying drink mandatory per person (except water & coffee)

-Offer cannot be combined with any discounts or on going promotions
ru_RU.schedule2_translated: ТАЙСКАЯ КУХНЯ С 8:30 УТРА ДО 8:30 ВЕЧЕРА

th_TH.title: EAT AT SIVANA
th_TH.subtitle_translated: ร้านอาหารอินเดียและไทย
th_TH.schedule1_translated: อาหารอินเดีย 11:00 AM
th_TH.schedule2_translated: อาหารไทย  8:30 AM - 20:30
th_TH.discount_translated: 30% ส่วนลดเฉพาะค่าอาหาร
